    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Event field on the provider notification form to show all the events available in the event registry and not restricted to any table</description>
        <name>Decouple table & event for notification</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (pm.isZboot())
		return;

	var dbObject = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	dbObject.addQuery('name', 'sys_notification');
	dbObject.addQuery('element','event');
	dbObject.query();
	if (!dbObject.next())
		return;
	dbObject.setValue('reference_qual', '');
	dbObject.setWorkflow(false);
	dbObject.update();

})();]]></script>
